name: reth-pos-devnet
description: This repository provides a docker-compose file to run a fully-functional, local development network for Ethereum with proof-of-stake enabled. This configuration uses [Prysm](https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm) as a consensus client and [go-ethereum](https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum) for execution. **It starts from proof-of-stake** and does not go through the Ethereum merge.
